Data Fields
rlRfRunTimeCalibReport_t Struct Reference

mmWaveLink RF Run time calibration report for event RL_RF_AE_RUN_TIME_CALIB_REPORT_SB More...

#include <control/mmwavelink/mmwavelink.h>

Data Fields

rlUInt32_t calibErrorFlag
 1 = calibration is passed, 0 = calibration is failed or not enabled/performed at
least once.
Bit: Calibration
0: SYNTH VCO3 tuning (Available only on selected xWR6243 device variants, RESERVED for other 60GHz devices. Ignore while store restore)
1: APLL tuning
2: SYNTH VCO1 tuning
3: SYNTH VCO2 tuning
4: LODIST calibration
5: [Reserved]
6: [Reserved]
7: [Reserved]
8: PD calibration
9: TX Power calibration
10: RX gain calibration
11: [Reserved]
12: [Reserved]
31:13: [Reserved]

 
rlUInt32_t calibUpdateStatus
 Whether each calibration resulted in a reconfiguration of RF is indicated by a
value of 1 in the respective bit in this field. It has bit definition as
above
.
 
rlInt16_t temperature
 Measured temperature, based on average of temperature sensors near all enabled TX and RX channels at the time of calibration. Note that this temperature will be updated only when a run-time calibration is executed due to a change in temperature by more than 10 deg C.
1 LSB = 1 degree Celsius
.
 
rlUInt16_t reserved0
 Reserved for future use.
 
rlUInt32_t timeStamp
 This field indicates when the calibration updates were performed.
1 LSB = 1 millisecond
(the stamp rolls over upon exceeding allotted bit width)
.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved1
 Reserved for future use.
